transcript:
Executive: Hi, if you record your name and reason for calling, I'll see if this person is available.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: I am Vidya from IndiaMART head office.
Executive: Thanks, please stay on the line.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Good afternoon.
Customer: Yes sir, yes ma'am.
Executive: Sir, main Vidya baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Haan ji ma'am, suniye na ma'am.
Executive: Ji sir, bataiye.
Customer: Actually mera jo IndiaMART ka account hai na, us pe maine profile pe jaake do number dale hue hai, theek hai?
Customer: Main jo use karta hu, lekin
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek to hai 672 se end hota hai aur ek end hota hai 131 se.
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Sir yahi do number hai waha pe.
Customer: Ek kya aa raha hai last number?
Executive: 672.
Customer: Haan right, 672.
Customer: Aur ek 131.
Executive: Correct.
Customer: Haan haan right, ye do number add kiye, theek hai.
Customer: Abhi jab main ma'am ye karne ja raha hu samjho kisi ko catalog share kar raha hu whatsapp pe.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To us pe contact info me directly jab call karne ka option waha pe ek message me bhi likha hua aa raha hai, wo hamara actually company ka number hai shayad wo landline ka, wo ja raha hai plus catalog koi open karke bhi open karta hai na to pehle company ka naam aata hai Jitendra profile ke baad.
Executive: Haan matlab number aapka ja raha hoga, ek baar check kariye kya ye number ja raha hai 7942612860.
Customer: Haan haan haan barobar haan.
Executive: Ye aapka preferred number hai IndiaMART ne jo aapko virtual number allocate karti hai, wo number jaata hai.
Executive: Us number pe agar koi call karega to aapke jo number hai in dono par sath ring hoga.
Customer: Achha waisa hai kya? Matlab directly number nahi jaata unke paas?
Executive: Nahi, virtual number hai ye aapka IndiaMART ne aapko assign kara hua hai.
Executive: Is number pe jab bhi koi call karega to aapke dono number pe call aayega.
Customer: Achha aisa hai kya? Wahi main sochu ye number kiska hai directly ye kaise ho gaya.
Executive: Nahi, ye IndiaMART ne aapka, aapne dekha hoga aapki jo profile hai na usme bhi contact usme aap dekhiye aapko wahi number visible hoga.
Customer: Haan haan haan right.
Executive: Ye aapka virtual number hai jo aapko assign karti hai IndiaMART.
Executive: Aur aapko jab bhi koi call is number pe karna hai to aapke paas jo call aayegi wo aayegi hamesha ek hi number se aayegi 07942554266, is number ko save bhi kar lijiye.
Customer: Achha achha right right.
Customer: To unka number to mujhe display hoga na jo original number hai?
Executive: Nahi uska aapko display 07942554266 hoga but aap apne lead manager me jaakar unka number dekh sakte hain.
Customer: Achha aisa hai kya?
Executive: Haan, aapke lead manager me aapke paas unki details aa jayengi.
Customer: Okay okay samajh gaya.
Executive: Haan, number aapko hamesha ek hi display hoga incoming me.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Jisse aapko ye identify ho jaaye ki aapke paas koi buyer call kar raha hai.
Executive: Aap is number ko save kar lijiye 07942554266.
Customer: Theek hai chalega.
Executive: Theek hai? Aur buyer ko jo number visible hoga wo rahega ek minute 07942612860.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Theek hai? Dusra abhi aapne IndiaMART pe complaint raise kar dijiye customer care pe call karke buyer ke calls ke regarding.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Uske liye aapka Khushi ji ke sath discussion hua tha ki aapki profile abhi do din pehle hi activate hui hai, aap apni service use karna start kariye, buyleads use karna start kariye, ye sabhi lead aayi hai CNC plasma cutting machine services ki.
Executive: Ye relevant hai aapke liye? Abhi dekhiye zero second ki lead hai, isse purchase kariye recent buylead me aaiye.
Customer: Ah, ek minute ma'am aap suniye na ma'am aap mujhe ek one hour baad call karoge kya? Tab main thoda free hoga to.
Executive: Ji, main one hour ke baad bhi call kar lungi, main aapko ye batana chah rahi hu ki ek lead sirf paanch se chhe logo ke liye available hoti hai aur jaise hi wo log purchase kar lete hain wo lead gayab ho jaati hai, total se sold out ho jaati hai.
Executive: Agar aapke kaam ki hai, to please aap ise ignore na karke purchase kar dijiye.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Customer: Actually ma'am suniye na aap mujhe one hour baad call karke pura ek baar explain kar dijiye na mujhe na matlab actually pura samjha hi nahi iska kaisa hai matlab kaise naye customer dhunde wo sab.
Executive: To theek hai one hour ke baad hum ek baar connect kar lete hain, ya video meeting ka time de payenge aap sir one hour ke baad?
Customer: Haan de payenge.
Executive: Google meet ke through hum aapko screen share kar so that aap mujhe call kar dena pehle ek 3 3:30 tak.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To fir chahiye to meeting bhi kar sakte hain.
Executive: Theek hai aur baki sir aapne jo ye concern close raise kara tha IndiaMART pe ye main close kar du?
Customer: Kaunsa wala ma'am?
Executive: Wo jo aapne customer care pe call kara tha na ki aapke paas calls aa rahe hain.
Customer: Haan haan haan haan haan, haan theek hai wo band kar do lekin aap mujhe call back kar dena 3:30 tak.
Executive: Haan sir aapke paas call back zarur aayega, secondly aapke paas na ek aapke paas jo aapka primary number hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ka notification jaayega humne aapki complaint close kari hai to feedback ke regarding, to aapke jis jiske paas bhi ye primary number hai aap please unhe inform kar dijiyega, aapke sath discussion ho gaya hai aur aapko inform karke hi humne concern close kara hai.
Customer: Okay okay chalega, theek hai ma'am.
Executive: Theek hai? Okay okay sir, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is getting calls on company landline.

- Wants to understand how to find new customers.



Resolution:

- Explained virtual number concept.

- Explained how to check original number in lead manager.

- Executive offered to call back after one hour.

- Executive offered a video meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after one hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- virtual number, buyleads, profile, customer care
